descriptionHtml:
Well,this is my first Skyrim mod.It\'s very simple and I\'m sure that someone else too did it(though he didn\'t uploaded it for obvious,difficulty-related reasons),yet,I think it\'s a decent start,and,also,not anyone can make an alternative start so...why not?
Basically,it makes you start as a Forsworn(with,obviously,Forsworn stuff and you as a part of the Forsworn faction,so they do not attack you)in Serpent\'s Bluff Redoubt.You start INSIDE the dungeon,but,of course,just near the door to the exterior.


Inconvenients/bugs
-you don\'t start as a dragonborn,the storyline is completely disabled
-markath guards attack you,since forsworn and markath guards are set to be hostile

To install,copy the Skyrim.ini in your My Games/Skyrim folder,and the \"forsworn\"text file in your Skyrim folder.Then start Skyrim and type \"bat forsworn\"  (no quotation marks).
author: valery93
